desc: The application or web page, aims to optimize people's time in an attractive and effective way. The main idea is to make an initial diary with the tasks that each person must perform daily, assigning them time objectives and short-term goals initially. Most people perform their tasks in a monotonous, automated way leaving aside or not considering additional ways that could improve the performance of these, without taking into account that they may be making mistakes and are letting themselves go because of simple everyday . With this application or web page we can improve the quality of the tasks, optimize the times, correct the errors that may be committed (adding to it, traffic problems, weather, best routes, tips for healthy snacks or meetings, complete agenda with personal commitments and of children in case of family). Make a task tool that is assigned to family members who have a weekly or monthly gain or prize when completed. It is important that each person choose a task that provides "personal", "coupled" and "family" satisfaction. Being able to achieve the optimization of the times could be achieved without major inconveniences with a correct organization. People can additionally add tasks that they want to perform for example 30 minutes of exercise, reading, etc. Finally, what would be achieved would be greater harmony, less chaos in daily tasks, people learn to plan and organize more efficiently and be able to have at the end of the day the satisfaction of having achieved what they have proposed. Making it clear that it is a process, you must start with basic and easily achievable tasks to achieve self-motivation and satisfaction that allows you to continue to use the APP, buying upgrades for example and increasing the difficulty as you achieve objectives.
title: DAILY GRAM  The Funtasktic Routine App

This is for a car rental business that is part of a larger travel company.The initial project will be an IOS app as a first step. This will hopefully lead us to finding the right team, as well as to review its implementation. The main goal will be to create ease of using the app with a bold design. After testing this and reviewing what works and what doesn't, our company will then move forward with a full digital platform. Please only inquiry if you are able to take this, and are committed towards full communication and a long term project.What we would like to know is if you have the capacity for this project? desc: I need an app like the mockups attached that can allow an user to login (or register an account), choose the level of language (preA1, A1, A2), then he can choose the topic category and answer to 10 questions each category (the questions are 3 types like the mockups). Every question has a limited time to be answered, like 10 seconds, and if the user does not answer before goes ahead to the next question and take 0 point to the unanswered one. At the end of the 10 questions if the user has answered well at least 6/10 questions the category will get closed and successful passed otherwise he can try other 2 times more in the same category with different questions.The app should work on iOS and android platforms and we accept also hybrid app so made with ionic framework or similar.Then the administrator has to manage the app contents through a wordpress site backend area (plugin) and he has able to add, edit ore delete categories and questions. He has to be able to manage the users, see which ones have passed the test succefully (to pass the test a user has to pass a prefixed number of categories) and what questions they answered well and not.In order to give 3 attempts to the user each category the administrator has to add at least 30 questions to the category before the category can be shown to the app.Each question can be of three type so for this please have look the mockup for a better understanding.Please let me know time and budget to develop the app.If you need more details let me knowRegardsRiccardo
title: Learn italian (preA1, A1, A2) app iOS and android
